verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I AM COVERED OVER
With the robe of righteousness
That Jesus gives to me,
I am covered over
With the righteous blood of Jesus,
And He lives in me.
What a joy to know
The Heavenly Father loves me so
And gives to me--my Jesus.
When He looks at me
He sees not what I used to be,
But He sees Jesus.
